channel.title: Shops!
channel.description:
Whenever i try to trade a shop it disconnects me... this is what happends in runserver.bat can someone please tell me how to fix? Its making me verry angry :mad:
[CODE]---BlitzScape by Wolf |-Enabled-| --- java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: -101 at client.parseIncomingPackets(client.java:13463) at client.packetProcess(client.java:12577) at client.process(client.java:12547) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:138) at server.main(server.java:50) Project16 [fatal] - exception test's file has been saved! ClientHandler: Client test disconnected. [/CODE]
REP++ if you help me fix it

item.title: Shops!
item.dc:creator: @mr_monkey mr monkey
item.description:
@mr_monkey wrote:

THANK YOU SO MUCH!!!OMG THANKS im so relived!

Read full topic

item.title: Shops!
item.dc:creator: @xxxxxx_13 xxxxxx 13
item.description:
@xxxxxx_13 wrote:

ooooh. thinks back i had this problem. i think it has something to do with the npc u use. try changing the npc and the value of the objects in the shops. if all fails. get a new compiler.

Read full topic

@mr_monkey wrote:

:mad: it makes me mad… its happend on my other server but then i switched to a new one. i can never fix it
